title: Mafia: Definitive Edition
notes: Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: Re-made from the ground up, rise through the ranks of the Mafia during the Prohibition era of organized crime. After a run-in with the mob, cab driver Tommy Angelo is thrust into a deadly underworld. Initially uneasy about falling in with the Salieri crime family, Tommy soon finds that the rewards are too big to ignore.
